law.catch_line: If a manufacturer, distributor, or factory branch terminates, suspends, refuses to renew, or closes ...

section.section:
If a manufacturer of motor homes terminates or cancels a motor home dealer, the manufacturer shall reimburse the dealer, less any allowances, discounts, or rebates paid to the dealer by the manufacturer, for at least:
The total net inventory invoice costs;
Any charges by the manufacturer for distribution delivery; and
Any inventory related taxes paid by the dealer.
